data.text: @HersonVazkez Aw, muchas gracias! Buena suerte con la carrera! x
@cjtudor É o mesmo sentimento de quando terminamos um livro,conseguimos!😄

@AuthorAllieR My symptoms were mild, but I definitely noticed chest tightness/fatigue when I started running again. I've kept at it, not pushing myself too hard, and it's much better now - almost back to normal. Hope your symptoms improve. Give it some time. x
@cjtudor Que incrível😃👏🏾A satisfação depois da corrida deve ser enorme!

@cjtudor Congratulations! I had suspected Covid 2ths ago, very mild but fatigue/tightness of chest/inflammation ever since. My heart rate still shoots up after just 10-minute run - it went to 169. Does yours? I'm scared to push myself as I had bad cardio effects from 2nd Pfizer 6mths ago.
